title: Prof. Nyang's Team Paper Accepted at NDSS 2025
summary: Prof. Daehun Nyang's research team's 'SketchFeature' paper has been accepted at NDSS 2025, a top-tier security conference.
content: This research proposes high-quality per-flow feature extraction technology, significantly improving the performance of security data planes.
